description: The invention of the wheel, a key technological advancement.
The discovery and control of fire.
Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin land on the moon.
The fall of the Berlin Wall marking the end of the Cold War.
The beginning of World War I.
Johannes Gutenberg invents the printing press.

event: Signing of the Declaration of Independence
description: The United States Declaration of Independence is signed.
The French Revolution starts.

event: First Flight by the Wright Brothers
description: The Wright brothers make their first successful flight.
The ARPANET adopts TCP/IP protocol, marking the beginning of the internet.
The Renaissance period begins in Europe.
Christopher Columbus discovers America.
The Industrial Revolution begins.
World War II comes to an end.
The Cold War begins.
Alexander Graham Bell invents the telephone.
The Great Depression begins.
Nelson Mandela is released from prison.
The fall of Constantinople marks the end of the Byzantine Empire.
The Black Death pandemic begins in Europe.
